### IX International Workshop on Locational Analysis and Related Problems

**Cádiz (Spain), 30 January – 1 February 2019**

Contact: [iwoloca@uca.es](mailto:iwoloca@uca.es)

::: {.panel-tabset}

## Welcome

![](images/cartel_Congreso_2019WEB.jpg)

**Welcome,**

The **International Workshop on Locational Analysis and Related Problems** took place on **January 30 – February 1, 2019 in Cádiz (Spain)**.

It was organized by the **Spanish Location Network** and **GELOCA**, the SEIO working group on Location.  
The Spanish Location Network is composed of more than **140 researchers**, distributed among several Spanish universities.

The aim of the workshop is to promote communication among researchers and to contribute to the development of **locational analysis and related problems**.  
The previous meeting was held in **Segovia (September 27–29, 2017)**.

The topics of interest include location models, networks, transportation, logistics, exact and heuristic solution methods, and computational geometry.

Researchers and practitioners were invited to present works in the form of **oral communications**.  
For participation, the submission of a **short abstract** was required.
